articles.title: Niger coup: Wagner taking advantage of instability - Antony Blinken - BBC
articles.description: There are concerns the Russian mercenary group may be gaining influence in the country.
articles.content:
Russia's Wagner mercenary group is "taking advantage" of instability in Niger, US Secretary of State Antony Blinken has told the BBC.
